title: Kathukutti to Release on October 9
text:
Photos 
Director Era Saravanan’s film Kathukutti, which was to originally release on October 1, is now expected to hit screens on October 9. The release of the film was postponed after one of the film’s producers Anwar Kabir procured a stay on the film’s release from the Madras High Court stating that the other producer of the film, Ram Kumar, owed him a sum of `1 crore and `30 lakh. He contended that the film be allowed to release only after the sum due to him was paid. Accepting his plea, the High Court granted a two-week stay on the release of the film. Sources say that recently, the case came up for hearing again and director Ram Kumar submitted a cheque for `58 lakh to the court. After this, the stay on the film’s release was vacated. The film, which features Narain, Srushti Dange and Suri in the lead, is a comedy which will focus on farmers’ issues.
